cards.title: Human in the loop automation: Build AI workflows that keep humans in control
cards.tagline: Enhance project oversight with AI-driven human-in-the-loop automation
tldr: Human-in-the-loop automation addresses the risk of AI errors in project workflows, ensuring accuracy and compliance.
Key features include review checkpoints that allow human judgment at critical decision points, enhancing overall workflow reliability.
Implement HITL by integrating review steps in n8n workflows, focusing on high-risk tasks for optimal efficiency.
Use cases include approving project budgets, reviewing compliance documents, and validating AI-generated reports in PMO settings.
